title: Wedding Theme Skin Idea
body:
I just got this lit idea of like one those legendary skin VS. events (Like the god king garen and darius one)
I was thinking along the lines of like - Evelynn & Elise: Wedding Succubi

I just thought having a cool legendary skin fo em each (since both dont have one yet) and Having like two hot jungler ladies have this "pure / innocent" skin style would be really cool :)

What do y'all think?

replies.body: If it helps, Ghost Bride Morgana is indeed a thing. I won't object to a bride line in the same vein for Elise and Evelynn, though (However I think Morgana specifically got the skin because I've heard her called the marriage simulator because of how many shackles her kit has).

>
> If it helps, Ghost Bride Morgana is indeed a thing. I won't object to a bride line in the same vein for Elise and Evelynn, though (However I think Morgana specifically got the skin because I've heard her called the marriage simulator because of how many shackles her kit has).

Ah i see that makes sense, thatd be a skin line thatd be cool if they continued it though!

{{champion:254}} 
Could be another candidate, especially since it could be interesting that she is more tomboyish, while Elise and Evelynn would both basically fit in the same type of wedding dress.

Oooh good point I like that idea! Vi would be really nice~

I doubt Riot would ever go that way with how sensitive people are to romances and sexuality of their favorite characters.

A wedding theme, sure, but make it standalone for each character.
